ygData.subject: Re: Making coin at level 10
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to South Ro!  It s easy to get to... just follow the coast through Oasis, and when you get to the mountain wall just hang a right and you ll find the pass
ygData.messageBody:
Go to South Ro! It's easy to get to... just follow the coast through
Oasis, and when you get to the mountain wall just hang a right and you'll
find the pass soon enough. SGs aren't that dangerous when you move like the
wind.

So Ro has been getting a little more crowded lately at peak hours, but still
not as much as other zones. You should be able to 1) Lament a few orc camps
(that are never camped!) if alone, or 2) join up with some trolls (who never
get the benefit of a good bard) and kill Dervishes for their bronze weapons
and rings. In the NW corner is a euridite merchant, and the center a few
dark elf female merchants. South Ro is nice because it just isn't that
crowded, and it's always fun to hang out with trolls who talk like total
morons.

For real fun, find Innothule Swamp in the SW corner, hang a left and follow
the coast, and enter upper Guk. Kill a lot of frogloks, and you should come
out with a nice collection of woven armor. (I've been in Guk for hours and
found not a thing, then found 3 woven gloves in a row.) Take the woven to
Qeynos where there are lots of monks and higher demand for the stuff. Sell
any gloves you find for as much as you can, O' 8pp or more. I made 60 pp
with a few packfulls from Guk to Qeynos, and that was with people telling me
my prices were more than fair.

Roop



>From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>Did you lose a magic weapon? or just your regular mino axe / store bought
>weapon?
>
>Not sure where you're at, but here's some ideas:
>
>1) From your message it sounds like you also want experience. If not you
>can kill every orc pawn in east and west commons. Cloth armor and weapons.
>
>2) Paw is an excellent source for weapons(5s - 2.5gp), cloth armor (1-4gp)
>and occasional shields (8gp) AND experience.
>
>3) Giant snakes, giant rattle snakes and asps. These are a source of giant
>snake fangs (4-5gp). You might want a cleric along on this one. :)
>
>4) Steamfont. Harpies and skeletons and minos.
>
>Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>

>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Hello fellow loremasters!
>
>Due to my recent adventures with the rogue Evil Eye and resulting loss of
>my only decent weapon I find a desperate need to acquire wealth. Could
>anyone offer any suggestions for a 10th level, sigh was 11th once, bard to
>really earn some coin? I have found it difficult to make much as most of
>the critters I get xp from are terribly cash poor in terms of loot
>available. I have a monk friend so can take on stuff slightly more
>powerful than I alone. All suggestions welcomed!
>
>wait...almost all...if someone shouts kill snakes I think I'll scream...
>
> Kitasi
> The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
> "and no one shall work for money,
> and no one shall work for fame"
> "but each for the joy of the working,
> and each to his seperate star..."
>
>
>oops, looks like I'll be working for money, kust more proof the world's not
